titleStmt.title: Ionahs sermon, and Ninivehs repentance A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse Jun. 20. 1602. and now thought fit to be published for our meditations in these times. By Ro. Wakeman Master of Arts and fellow of Balioll Colledge in Oxford.
Jonahs sermon, and Ninivehs repentance.
titleStmt.author: Wakeman, Robert, 1575 or 6-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, and are to bee sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne
